price: Enyi mlio amini! Mt'iini Mwenyezi Mungu na Mtume wake, wala msijiepushe naye, nanyi mnasikia.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ أَطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَلَا تَوَلَّوۡاْ عَنۡهُ وَأَنتُمۡ تَسۡمَعُونَ
footnotes: Enyi mlio isadiki Haki, na mkaifuata! Hakika mmejua ushindi umepatikana kwa msaada wa Mwenyezi Mungu na kumt'ii Mtume wake. Basi endeleeni kumt'ii Mwenyezi Mungu na Mtume. Wala msiupuuze wito wa Mtume anao itia Haki, nanyi mnamsikia na mnafahamu ayasemayo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū aṭīʿū al-laha warasūlahu walā tawallaw ʿanhu wa-antum tasmaʿūna
